attributes.action: Any PM who leaves office in disgrace should not be allowed an Honours List.
attributes.additional_details:
A disgraced PM could elevate any number of unsuitable people to the House of Lords in revenge or to continue to an assault on democracy.
This needs to be addressed now before we are in that position.
attributes.background: Pass an Act that from this PM onwards who has to leave office in disgrace be disallowed an Honours List.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments.
